permafrost.tundra.configuration

Class ConfigurationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.configuration.ConfigurationManager

  • public class ConfigurationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Integration Server package configuration manager.

      • get

        public static com.wm.data.IData get()
                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                    com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Returns the configuration settings for the package containing the invoking service.
        Returns:
        The configuration settings for the package containing the invoking service.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an error occurs reading the configuration files.
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If an error occurs when substituting global variables.

      • get

        public static com.wm.data.IData get(java.lang.String packageName)
                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                    com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Returns the the configuration settings for the package with the given name.
        Parameters:
        packageName - The name of the package whose configuration is to be returned.
        Returns:
        The configuration settings associated with the named package.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an error occurs reading the configuration files.
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If an error occurs when substituting global variables.

      • get

        public static com.wm.data.IData get(java.lang.String packageName,
                                    boolean refresh)
                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                    com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Returns the the configuration settings for the package with the given name.
        Parameters:
        packageName - The name of the package whose configuration is to be returned.
        refresh - If true, the package configuration is refreshed from disk.
        Returns:
        The configuration settings associated with the named package.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an error occurs reading the configuration files.
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If an error occurs when substituting global variables.

      • get

        public static com.wm.data.IData get(java.lang.String packageName,
                                    boolean refresh,
                                    boolean updateCache)
                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                    com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Returns the the configuration settings for the package with the given name.
        Parameters:
        packageName - The name of the package whose configuration is to be returned.
        refresh - If true, the package configuration is refreshed from disk.
        updateCache - If true, and package configuration is refreshed from disk, the cache is updated with the refreshed configuration.
        Returns:
        The configuration settings associated with the named package.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an error occurs reading the configuration files.
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If an error occurs when substituting global variables.

                              throws java.io.IOException,
                                     com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Returns the given package's configuration stored on disk, without updating the configuration cache.
        Parameters:
        packageName - The name of the package whose configuration is to be returned.
        Returns:
        The configuration settings associated with the named package.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an error occurs reading the configuration files.
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If an error occurs when substituting global variables.

        public static com.wm.data.IData all()
                             throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException

        Throws:

        Returns an IDataTextParser that can parse the given file.

        Returns:
